hotels.name: Jehan Numa Palace Hotel
hotels.description: A heritage hotel with opulent rooms, a sprawling garden, and a rooftop pool offering panoramic views of the city.
hotels.address: 1, Shamla Hills, Near Van Vihar National Park, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh 462003

hotels.name: The Lalit, Bhopal
hotels.description: A modern and luxurious hotel with elegant rooms, a rooftop pool, a spa, and multiple dining options.
hotels.address: 122, VIP Road, Near New Market, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh 462003

hotels.name: Hotel Lake View Ashok
hotels.description: A lakeside hotel with stunning views of the Upper Lake, comfortable rooms, and an outdoor pool.
hotels.address: Shahpura, Near Van Vihar National Park, Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh 462016

places.name: Bharat Bhavan
places.details: A renowned cultural center showcasing Indian art, craft, and literature.

places.name: Rajwada
places.details: A magnificent palace built in the 18th century, showcasing the grandeur of the Bhopal State.

places.name: Moti Masjid
places.details: A beautiful mosque known for its intricate marble work and elegant architecture.

places.name: Van Vihar National Park
places.details: A lush green sanctuary home to various wildlife species, ideal for a relaxing day.

places.name: Upper Lake
places.details: A serene lake offering scenic views, boat rides, and a chance to soak in the tranquility.

places.name: State Museum
places.details: A comprehensive museum showcasing the history, art, and culture of Madhya Pradesh.

places.name: Taj-ul-Masjid
places.details: One of the largest mosques in India, known for its grandeur and intricate architecture.

places.name: Birla Mandir
places.details: A serene Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu, offering panoramic views of the city.

places.name: Bhopal Food Tour
places.details: Experience the rich culinary heritage of Bhopal with a guided food tour, sampling local delicacies.
